titleStmt.title: The state of the godly both in this life, and in the life to come deliuered in a sermon at Chudleigh in Devon: at the funeralls of the right worshipfull, the Ladie Elizabeth Courtney, the 11. of Nouember, 1605. And published for the instruction, and consolation of the faithfull. By R.W. minister. Whereunto is annexed the christian life and godly death of the sayd worshipfull Lady Elizabeth Courtney.
titleStmt.author: Wolcomb, Robert, b. 1567 or 8.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Bradock] for Roger Iackson, and are to be sold at his shoppe neere the Conduit in Fleetstreete,

notesStmt.note: R.W. = Robert Wolcomb, who has signed the dedication.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
